Address.label: Address
Address.value: 30 SOUTH MERIDIAN STREET,SUITE 1100, INDIANAPOLIS, Indiana, 46204, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Kite Realty Group Trust that owns mainly community shopping centers concentrated in Indiana (39% of base rent), Florida (22%), and Texas (19%). At year-end 2008, Kite owned interests in 52 retail operating properties and three commercial properties, representing 8.9 million of gross leasable area. It also had eight properties under development or redevelopment.

value.name: Pat Casey
value.title: Chief Technology Officer & Senior Vice President
